name: Reckoning Day
description:
When your life starts to lose value, something needs to be done. 

In this corrupted society ruled by mafia, you need to be careful with balance. Los Gatos expensive way life broke the mob’s exchange rates. They have been like this for years, now they have to stop. Or be stopped. It is time… for payback. ———– Reckoning Day – INSTRUCTIONS ——————————————  WASD/ZQSD : Movement  Left Click : Shoot
